name: humanizeContent

APIKey.description: API Key for accessing the humanization service.

purpose.description: Default purpose for the text. Optional, default: "General Writing"

strength.description: Increases aggressiveness of humanization algorithms. Optional, default: "Balanced"

readability.description: Default readability level. Optional, default: "High School"

description: Configure the humanization settings for the Undetectable.AI API.
